00019 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00020 
00021 Define_Module( TTETestApp);
00022 
00023 void TTETestApp::initialize()
00024 {
00025     scheduleAt(simTime(), new cMessage("ACTIVATOR!"));
00026 }
00027 
00028 void TTETestApp::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00029 {
00030     if (!msg->arrivedOn("TTin") && *new std::string(getParentModule()->getName()) != "videoclient")
00031     {
00032         CTFrame *frame = new CTFrame("CT-ID=100");
00033         MACAddress srcAddr;
00034         srcAddr.setAddress("03 04 05 06 00 64");
00035         frame->setDest(srcAddr);
00036         frame->setCtID(100);
00037         //ENDE TEST
00038 
00039         if (getParentModule()->getSubmodule("VL_TT_100_CTC"))
00040             sendDirect(frame, getParentModule()->getSubmodule("VL_TT_100_CTC")->gate("in"));
00041     }
00042 
00043     if (!msg->arrivedOn("TTin") && *new std::string(getParentModule()->getName()) != "videoclient")
00044     {
00045         CTFrame *frame = new CTFrame("CT-ID=101");
00046         MACAddress srcAddr;
00047         srcAddr.setAddress("03 04 05 06 00 65");
00048         frame->setDest(srcAddr);
00049         frame->setCtID(100);
00050         frame->setByteLength(1500);
00051         //ENDE TEST
00052 
00053         if (getParentModule()->getSubmodule("VL_TT_101_CTC"))
00054             sendDirect(frame, getParentModule()->getSubmodule("VL_TT_101_CTC")->gate("in"));
00055     }
00056 
00057     delete msg;
00058     // TODO - Generated method body
00059 }
00060 
00061 } //namespace
